name: Galactik Lanzer (Pre Alpha Concept)
description:
This project exposes very early the mechanics and the concept of the game.

Controls

[Keyboard]

Jump = left ctrl

Dash =  left alt

Attack = left shift

Move = left & right

Accept = enter

Pause/Cancel = esc

[Gamepad (Xbox)]

Jump = A Button

Dash = B Button

Attack = X Button

Move = D-Pad

Pause = Start
